|brand = MikroTik |model = RouterBOARD 2011 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = UiAS-2HnD-IN |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RB2011 |page_start_date = 02/04/2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/MikroTik_RouterBOARD_RB2011UiAS-2HnD-IN |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TV7RB2011-2HND |icid = 7442A-RB20112HND |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9344;AR9344-DC3A; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 600 <!-- --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML02G100TFI00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q50TIG; |flash2size = 512 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16FG-AC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327; |wan_ports = 5 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 18:FD:74 |oui = 18:FD:74
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RouterBOOT booter;6.49.10;; |stockos = RouterOS;6.49.10;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SFP |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sfp_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_poe_type = ns |pwr_poe = 24 |pwr_poe_amp = 1.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RJ45 console,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = buzzer, PoE in/out, LCD Display, SFP cage, metal case, heatsink |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.88.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/31/2012 |estreldate = 06/2012 |estprice = 130 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00BGIXOHQ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Latvia
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9344; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MMCX |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Atheros]] AR9344 @600MHz ([[MIPS 74Kc]]) *Flash (NAND): ''Spansion'' 128MB *Flash (SPI): ''Macronix'' MX25L8006E (1MB) *RAM: 2x ''Nanya'' 128MB (DDR2) *Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR9344 (2.4GHz WiSoC) *Network: 5x Fast Ethernet ports, :5x GbE ports, 1x SFP (GbE) cage *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: 8-30V via barrel or passive PoE
==Links of Interest== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/mikrotik/rb2011 ''MikroTik RouterBoard RB2011 series'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/mikrotik/mikrotik_rb2011uias-2hnd-in |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/mikrotik/rb2011uias |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ar71xx |subtarget = mikrotik |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = 19.07.10 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
